subject: RE: [junit] Re: Help plz...
msgSnippet: ... Yeah - I remember Gosling stating that Java Bytecode isn t much more than a serialized AST. ;) Regards, Ilja
messageBody:
Chris Dollin wrote:

> Yes, compilation can be a lossy process. But JVM bytecode
> isn't very lossy compared to the source, partly because of
> the requirement for bytecode verification. You can do a
> pretty good code code reconstruction, as existing decompilers
> demonstrate.

Yeah - I remember Gosling stating that Java Bytecode isn't much more
than a serialized AST. ;)

Regards, Ilja
